meanings.definition: Sheets of paperboard used for making containers.
meanings.sent1: The containerboards were stacked neatly in the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The factory ordered a shipment of containerboards for packaging.
meanings.sent3: When the containerboards started dancing, everyone was amazed!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she transformed the containerboards into beautiful gift boxes.
meanings.sent5: The containerboards gleamed under the sunlight, ready to be crafted into boxes.

meanings.definition: The material used to make containers.
meanings.sent1: Recycling old containerboards helps reduce waste.
meanings.sent2: The company sourced sustainable containerboards for their eco-friendly packaging.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide and seek among the containerboards.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were built on the sturdy foundation of containerboards.
meanings.sent5: The containerboards whispered stories of their previous lives as boxes.
